headline: Jim Cramer on Axon: “Motorola is a Powerful Competitor”
summary: Axon Enterprise, Inc. (NASDAQ:AXON) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer answered questions about. A caller mentioned that they have been buying AXON shares as the stock goes down and asked if they should continue doing that. Cramer replied: “Okay, so Rick Smith was on, he comported himself as usual excellently. But remember, Motorola is […]
